audio is out of sync, sounds scratchy, video isnt bad
Something wrong with this copy.  Does not play well in Media Player Div X, Classic etc.  Runs, with lots of micro errors.

I have a hi-def projector that's set @ 128 inches right now. Of course, I wouldn't try to watch this copy on that & complain when the movie looked like a bunch of blocks.
Other than that, I watch most of my movies on a 22" widescreen, flat panel monitor. And I'm NOT picky at all, about quality. I just don't want to wait an hour for a movie to download.
Even still, I had to come back here & complain... WARN those of you about to download this.
It's ALMOST up to aXXo standards. I'd call it about a 6
